title: Futurama - Complete Series High Quality
description:
I have been going through my nas updating everything to hd as much as i can

There seems to be a lack of quality rips of futurama

I re-encoded these for my own use and have decided to share them

Season's 1-5 where encoded by myself from DVD9 images


Settings used

Transmission 0.10.0.6534
Cropping = auto
Detelecine = Default
Decomb = Default
Framerate = Consant 23.996
Constant Quality = 10
x264 Preset = Very Slow
x264 Tune = Animation
H.264 Profile = High
H.264 Level = 4.1
Audio = Auto Passthru

Season 6/7/Movies are Blu-ray rips 
Video = Remux
Audio Season 6 = DTS to AC3
Audio Season 7 = DTS to AC3
Audio 00x01 - Bender's Big Score = Remux
Audio 00x02 - The Beast With A Billion Backs = Remux
Audio 00x05 - Bender's Game = Remux
Audio 00x06 - Into the Wild Green Yonder = DTS to AC3


00x02 - The Lost Adventure = encoded by mysef pal DVD9 (CQ 14) (deinterlaced)
00x04 - Everybody Loves Hypnotoad = encoded by my self ntsc DVD9 (CQ 10) (progressive)


General Information


Source...............: DVD9 / Blu-ray
Container............: MP4
Size.................: 97.1 GB

Audio Info

Codec................: AC-3
Bitrate..............: 192 Kbps / 640 kbps
kHz/bit..............: 48.0 KHz / 16 bits
Channels.............: 2.0 / 5.1
Language.............: ENGLiSH
Subtitles............: N/A

Video Info

Codec................: AVC
Format Profile Level.: High L4.1
Resolution...........: 720x480 / 1920x1080
Bitrate..............: Constant Quality 10
Framerate............: 23.996 FPS	


After quite a few try's these setting where the best i could get the ntsc dvd's 
If you know of better settings for the ntsc futurama set just let me know..
Im not talking bitrate here im talking ivtc etc..

Also feel free to post if i have made any file name mistakes etc..

Please share nice as this is 100gb
im not sharing out to every single person
If people arnt sharing well 
I will super seed only
